sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Calendar, Users, MessageSquare, MapPin, CreditCard, Home, Wifi, Car, Droplet } from 'lucide-react' import './BookNow.css' const getRoomDetails = (id) => ({ id, title: 'Cozy Studio Apartment', price: 15000, image: '/placeholder.svg?height=300&width=400', furnished: true, location: 'Kathmandu, Nepal', amenities: { parking: true, wifi: true, water: true }, videos: [ { url: '/sample-video.mp4', description: 'Living Room Tour' }, { url: '/sample-video2.mp4', description: 'Kitchen Overview' }, ], }) export default function BookNow() { const { id } = useParams() const roomDetails = getRoomDetails(id) const [bookingData, setBookingData] = useState({ moveInDate: '', leaseDuration: '6', familyMembers: 1, message: '', securityDeposit: roomDetails.price, }) const [showVideos, setShowVideos] = useState(false) const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setBookingData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Booking request submitted:', { roomId: id, ...bookingData }) alert('Your rental request has been submitted. You will be redirected to eSewa for payment.') window.location.href = 'https://esewa.com.np/payment/placeholder' } const openMapDirections = () => { const mapUrl = `https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=${encodeURIComponent(roomDetails.location)}` window.open(mapUrl, '_blank') } return (

Request to Rent

Complete your rental request for {roomDetails.title}

Back to Home

{roomDetails.title}

Rs {roomDetails.price.toLocaleString()}/month

{roomDetails.furnished ? 'Furnished' : 'Unfurnished'}

{roomDetails.location}

Amenities

    {roomDetails.amenities.parking && (
  • Parking
    • )} {roomDetails.amenities.wifi && (
  • WiFi
    • )} {roomDetails.amenities.water && (
  • Water
    • )}

Room Videos

{showVideos && (
{roomDetails.videos && roomDetails.videos.map((video, index) => (

{video.description}

))} {(!roomDetails.videos || roomDetails.videos.length === 0) && (

No videos available for this room.

)}
)}
